Package net.minestom.server.tab

Class TabListManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.tab.TabListManager
  • public class TabListManager
extends Object
    The TabListManager handles the potentially multiple tablists running on the server and controls how players view it To make a TabList simply use the method createTabList() and then from there you can add players that will be displayed add viewers that will see the TabList and change latency, gamemode displayed and so forth.

      TabListManager()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      @NotNull TabList createTabList()
      Creates a new TabList
      @NotNull TabList getDefaultTabList()
      This TabList is assigned to a player when they log in.
      @NotNull Set<TabList> getTabLists()
      Gets the registered TabLists
      void handleSkinInView​(Player displayedPlayer, Player viewer)
      This method sends the player info to the viewer if the displayedPlayer isn't on their TabList This resolves issues with skins not loading if the displayedPlayer isn't on the viewers TabList
      void setDefaultTabList​(@NotNull TabList defaultTabList)
      Sets the TabList that is assigned to a player when they log in
      void updateGamemode​(@NotNull Player player)
      Updates a player's gamemode for all viewers of the TabList
      void updateLatency​(@NotNull Player player)
      Updates the latency of the player in all TabLists that the player is displayed

      • handleSkinInView

        public void handleSkinInView​(Player displayedPlayer,
                             Player viewer)
        This method sends the player info to the viewer if the displayedPlayer isn't on their TabList This resolves issues with skins not loading if the displayedPlayer isn't on the viewers TabList
        Parameters:
        displayedPlayer - the player being viewed
        viewer - the player that is viewing the displayedPlayer

      • updateLatency

        public void updateLatency​(@NotNull
                          @NotNull Player player)
        Updates the latency of the player in all TabLists that the player is displayed
        Parameters:
        player - the updated player

        Updates a player's gamemode for all viewers of the TabList
        Parameters:
